00023 #ifndef DAZ_FACE_H
00024 #define DAZ_FACE_H

00032 /*****************************
00033     Definitions
00034 *****************************/

00036 #define DZ_MAX_FACE_EDGES           255
00037 
00038 // --------- Bit flags for the DzFace class
00039 // Set if this face has at least one vertIdx/uvIdx pair that does not match.
00040 #define DZ_ORPHAN_FACE_BIT          0x0001
00041 
00042 // Bits for facet selection and hiding. These flags are masked on load and save.
00043 #define DZ_HIDDEN_FACE_BIT          0x0002
00044 #define DZ_SELECTED_FACE_BIT        0x0004
00045 #define DZ_LOCKED_FACE_BIT          0x0008
00046 #define DZ_FACET_FLAG_BITMASK       0x000e
00047 
00048 // --------- Bit flags for the DzEdge class
00049 #define DZ_SD_CAGE_EDGE_BIT         0x0001
00050 #define DZ_SD_DISCONTINOUS_EDGE_BIT 0x0002
00051 
00052 /*****************************
00053     Class definitions
00054 *****************************/
00055 
00056 class DZ_EXPORT DzEdge {
00057 public:
00058     DzEdge() : m_vert1( -1 ), m_vert2( -1 ), m_facetA( -1 ),
00059         m_facetB( -1 ), m_offsetA( -1 ), m_offsetB( -1 ),
00060         m_idx( -1 ), m_flags( 0 )
00061     { }
00062 
00063     DzEdge( int v1, int v2 ) : m_facetA( -1 ), m_facetB( -1 ), 
00064         m_offsetA( -1 ), m_offsetB( -1 ), m_idx( -1 ), m_flags( 0 )
00065     {
00066         if( v1 < v2 ) { m_vert1 = v1; m_vert2 = v2; }
00067         else { m_vert1 = v2; m_vert2 = v1; }
00068     }
00069 
00070     DzEdge( const DzEdge &edge ) { *this = edge; }
00071 
00072     DzEdge  &operator=( const DzEdge &edge )
00073     {
00074         m_vert1 = edge.m_vert1; m_vert2 = edge.m_vert2;
00075         m_facetA = edge.m_facetA; m_facetB = edge.m_facetB;
00076         m_offsetA = edge.m_offsetA; m_offsetB = edge.m_offsetB;
00077         m_idx = edge.m_idx; m_flags = edge.m_flags;
00078         return *this;
00079     }
00080 
00081     bool    operator<( const DzEdge &edge ) const
00082     {
00083         if( m_vert1 < edge.m_vert1 ) return true;
00084         else if( m_vert1 == edge.m_vert1 ) return m_vert2 < edge.m_vert2;
00085         return false;
00086     }
00087 
00088     bool    operator==( const DzEdge &edge ) const
00089     { return (m_vert1 == edge.m_vert1 && m_vert2 == edge.m_vert2); }
00090 
00091     bool    isOpenEdge() const
00092     {
00093         if( m_facetA >= 0 && m_facetB >= 0 )
00094             return false;
00095         return true;
00096     }
00097 
00098     int     m_vert1, m_vert2;
00099     int     m_facetA, m_facetB;
00100     int     m_idx;
00101     char    m_offsetA, m_offsetB;
00102 
00103     unsigned short  m_flags;
00104 };
00105 
00106 class DZ_EXPORT DzFacet {
00107 public:
00108     DzFacet() { clear(); }
00109     DzFacet( const DzFacet &face ) { *this = face; }
00110 
00111     DzFacet &operator=( const DzFacet &face )
00112     {
00113         m_materialIdx = face.m_materialIdx;
00114         m_faceGroupIdx = face.m_faceGroupIdx;
00115         m_vertIdx[0] = face.m_vertIdx[0]; m_vertIdx[1] = face.m_vertIdx[1];
00116         m_vertIdx[2] = face.m_vertIdx[2]; m_vertIdx[3] = face.m_vertIdx[3];
00117         m_uvwIdx[0] = face.m_uvwIdx[0]; m_uvwIdx[1] = face.m_uvwIdx[1];
00118         m_uvwIdx[2] = face.m_uvwIdx[2]; m_uvwIdx[3] = face.m_uvwIdx[3];
00119         m_normIdx[0] = face.m_normIdx[0]; m_normIdx[1] = face.m_normIdx[1];
00120         m_normIdx[2] = face.m_normIdx[2]; m_normIdx[3] = face.m_normIdx[3];
00121         m_edges[0] = face.m_edges[0]; m_edges[1] = face.m_edges[1];
00122         m_edges[2] = face.m_edges[2]; m_edges[3] = face.m_edges[3];
00123         m_cageIdx = face.m_cageIdx;
00124         return *this;
00125     }
00126 
00127     bool    operator==( const DzFacet &face ) const
00128     {
00129         if( m_materialIdx != face.m_materialIdx ) return false;
00130         if( m_faceGroupIdx != face.m_faceGroupIdx ) return false;
00131         if( m_vertIdx[0] != face.m_vertIdx[0] || m_vertIdx[1] != face.m_vertIdx[1] ||
00132             m_vertIdx[2] != face.m_vertIdx[2] || m_vertIdx[3] != face.m_vertIdx[3] )
00133             return false;
00134         if( m_uvwIdx[0] != face.m_uvwIdx[0] || m_uvwIdx[1] != face.m_uvwIdx[1] ||
00135             m_uvwIdx[2] != face.m_uvwIdx[2] || m_uvwIdx[3] != face.m_uvwIdx[3] )
00136             return false;
00137         if( m_normIdx[0] != face.m_normIdx[0] || m_normIdx[1] != face.m_normIdx[1] ||
00138             m_normIdx[2] != face.m_normIdx[2] || m_normIdx[3] != face.m_normIdx[3] )
00139             return false;
00140         if ( m_cageIdx != face.m_cageIdx )
00141             return false;
00142         return true;
00143     }
00144 
00145     void    clear()
00146     {
00147         m_materialIdx = 0;
00148         m_faceGroupIdx = 0;
00149         m_vertIdx[0] = m_vertIdx[1] = m_vertIdx[2] = m_vertIdx[3] = -1;
00150         m_uvwIdx[0] = m_uvwIdx[1] = m_uvwIdx[2] = m_uvwIdx[3] = -1;
00151         m_normIdx[0] = m_normIdx[1] = m_normIdx[2] = m_normIdx[3] = -1;
00152         m_edges[0] = m_edges[1] = m_edges[2] = m_edges[3] = -1;
00153         m_cageIdx = -1;
00154     }
00155 
00156     bool    isQuad() const { return (m_vertIdx[3] >= 0); }
00157     bool    isTri() const { return (m_vertIdx[3] < 0); }
00158 
00159     unsigned short  m_materialIdx;
00160     unsigned short  m_faceGroupIdx;
00161     int             m_vertIdx[4], m_uvwIdx[4], m_normIdx[4];
00162     int             m_edges[4], m_cageIdx;
00163 };
